message: Let's make a deal Bob. This offer gives me a slight advantage, but it's a fair starting point.  What do you say?
Let's split things a bit more evenly this time, Alice.  Remember, time is money - literally!
Okay, Bob, let's try this again.  My offer is still generous considering the inflation working against you.  Time is running out!
Alice, it seems we both value our time. Let's make it simple and split this right down the middle.  A fair deal before inflation eats away at our potential gains!
